lead_paragraph: South Africa need five wickets on Friday to secure victory in the first test after Sri Lanka provided dogged resistance and were 240 for five at stumps on the fourth day at St George’s Park on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: South Africa Need Five Wickets to Win First Test
headline.main: South Africa Need Five Wickets to Win First Test
